title: Elon Musk threatens Apple & Google with making his own phone: a win for tech freedom!

00:00 Intro
00:10 Apple potentially not allowing twitter onto app store
00:40 Solving the problem of limited app availability
01:00 How can people use twitter on their phone if google & apple disapprove?
01:10 with iOS, no hope. 
01:18 Freedom is lost with each generation; cars 
01:38 Cellphones, bootloader locked
01:50 iPhones, application installation privileges locked out
02:10 The stans. I see you.
02:28 Using his cult of personality to bring back respct for freedom
02:45 Windows XP days 
03:39 The pendulum of freedom has swung in the other direction
04:05 Sideloading on Android
04:30 The F-Droid store
04:45 Normalizing sovereignity & freedom is a good thing
06:12 A new phone is unnecessary for this
06:40 GrapheneOS, the proper way to use Android!
06:56 This is reinventing the wheel
07:20 How Elon Musk could improve the Android landscape
07:32 Google's anti-competitive behavior
08:10 Google has been fined for this before
08:29 Elon would make a great adversary for Google
10:19 If he changes the culture in this way, I'd almost pay $8/mo for twitter

11:55 Relationship between audits & cats
